Articles.Content:
I just downloaded .25.0 today, and was able to play normally for a while. I decided to use my joystick, so I exited the game, and now I can't RE-ENTER the game

Like the title says, when I open the KSP launcher, it says checking for updates... It never ends, and because of that, I can't play. I was only able to play once, and when I ended that session, I went to the main menu and clicked 'quit game' I'm running Windows 8.1

That's weird... you should be able to bypass the launcher by running the KSP.exe directly, instead of using the Launcher.exe. Not sure exactly why it would hang there, though... do you have any virtual network adapters installed? (e.g., Hamachi, or possibly other VPN services). If you do, try disabling their adapters in Control Panel.

If you have a network connection, but it does not have internet, this results.

Either fully disconnect the device/unload the internet software/etc, or establish a working internet and try again.

Or.. just run directly from ksp.exe

It's just a he11 of a pain if your last action in launcher was to tweak graphics, and now it won't load direct and also won't load launcher to revert settings with.
